metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0223 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from 15.5 before 15.7.8, all versions starting from 15.8 before 15.8.4, all versions starting from 15.9 before 15.9.2. Non-project members could retrieve release descriptions via the API, even if the release visibility is restricted to project members only in the project settings.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
